inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documentation of HIV-1 infection by a licensed ELISA test and confirmed by a Western Blot
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: CD4 greater than or equal to 500 cells/mm(3) or CD4 greater than or equal to 350 cells/mm(3) and HIV VL less than or equal to 40,000 copies per milliliter
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: If not HAART naive, history of HIV VL suppression while on HAART treatment.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are currently on HAART but do not meet criteria for the initiation of HAART according to current DHHS guidelines must be willing to come off their regimen 3 months prior to study initiation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documentation of Hepatitis C infection by demonstration of a positive test for hepatitis C antibody.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: HCV RNA level greater than 2000 copies per milliliter by polymerase chain reaction
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients naive to HCV treatment at time of enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum phosphorus greater than or equal to 2.2 mg/dL (normal range NIH 2.3-4.3 mg/dL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Neutrophil count greater than or equal to 1000 cells/mm(3)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: PT-INR (in the absence of anti-cardiolipin Ab) by greater than or equal to 2.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Recent HIV seroconverters (must be 6 months or more with documented HIV diagnosis).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and the recent coinfection with HBV. He has been on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
